mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing images and fonts for faster loading on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Implement image compression and leverage browser caching to reduce load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve keyword usage in page titles, headers, and meta descriptions for better SEO performance.
userExperienceTip: Ensure all interactive elements, such as buttons and forms, are easy to access on mobile.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps and adding progress indicators.
tips: Consider adding a live chat option to increase engagement.
Improve website navigation by consolidating related sections.
